DOC.brief_summary: Continuous noninvasive blood pressure monitoring may help to avoid intraoperative Hypotension or Hypertension
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Continuous Noninvasive Arterial Pressure Measurement on Anaesthesia
DOC.criteria: orthopedic surgery in general anaesthesia American Society of Anesthesiologists Physical Status (ASA) 2 or ASA 3 arterial Hypertension invasive blood pressure monitoring required
